attributes.action: EE should lose their licence as they are endangering lives of vulnerable people
attributes.background: I reported a fault on my elderly parents landline and EE refused to investigate on the grounds of data protection, despite the fact that they cannot make or receive calls because of the fault and EE were advised that my parents both have serious medical issues.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. The decision whether or not to grant a licence to EE is one for the UK communications regulator, Ofcom. You can find out how to contact Ofcom on their website: https://www.ofcom.org.uk/about-ofcom/contact-us
